evidence.claim: MobileSmith Health utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure and hosting solutions.
Their platforms comply with HIPAA regulations, indicating the use of secure health data transactions.
The use of FHIR APIs allows for seamless electronic health record interoperability.
Integration with HL7 standards for healthcare interoperability is part of their service offering.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transactions or clearinghouse capabilities.
